info.name: karneval - nai dashboard theme
info.description: a cute and simple tumblr theme featuring little nai and a sheep along with a yukkin home button :3 background | home icon | full syle
info.additionalInfo: as always, if you find any problems or if you don't know how to replace the home button with another style you've installed, feel free to ask me :) i think this theme also looks really cute with the butterfly logo but i just love yukkin n___n i have another theme and other karneval styles on my page if you want more!!
